description: The DND to maintain and support CFB Esquimalt'S CCTV system
full_summary:
================================

**Title**
--------

W0103-239321 - CCTV Maintenance and Support

**Reference Number**
------------------

* WS3784390828-Doc3826573651

**Tender Announcement**
----------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of the Department of National Defence, is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the CCTV Maintenance and Support contract.

**Contract Requirements**
------------------------

The selected contractor will provide maintenance and support services for the Closed Circuit Television (CCTV) system at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Esquimalt.

**Key Information**
------------------

* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* **Regions of Delivery**: British Columbia
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contract Start Date**: None (expected)
* **Contract End Date**: 2026-03-31 (expected)

**Contact Information**
----------------------

 Jackson, Brittney (SPAC/PSPC)
 brittney.jackson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice URL**
------------

* http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15216473?extsite=MTUyMTY0NzNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Publication Date**
------------------

* 2023-01-24
**Tender Closing Date**
----------------------

* 2023-02-09T14:00:00 (expired)
